trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN601_02997_SEQ_00<tab>Zukin is clamoring for giant clams.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN601_02997_TODO_00<tab>Obtain slick debris from giant clams.
TEXT_BANKJN601_02997_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the slick debris to Zukin.

TEXT_BANKJN601_02997_ZUKIN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you are familiar with giant clams, yes? They have an appetite to match their prodigious size, and are known to indiscriminately devour random objects that drift by.
TEXT_BANKJN601_02997_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>I would be grateful if you could seek out these clams, prise them open, and bring back the slick debris you find inside. Four such pieces should suffice.
TEXT_BANKJN601_02997_ZUKIN_000_020<tab>Ah, there you are, and with your arms intact. Just as well─we may still have need of them. But come, let us see what the clams have rendered up.
TEXT_BANKJN601_02997_ZUKIN_000_021<tab>Yes, these are precisely what I sought! You have done well, my friend.

TEXT_BANKJN601_02997_ZUKIN_000_022<tab>When a foreign object settles inside a shell, it gradually develops a hard and lustrous coating. While such articles are not as valuable as a well-formed pearl, they are not without worth. Nor is it unheard of for clams to be holding treasures!
